mapper.insert: insert into db_tasklog (SEQUENCEID, SID, STYPE, STYPENAME, OPER, OPERTIME, TOOPER, TOOPERTIME, 'STATUS', STATUSNAME, SLEVEL, CHECKRESULT, SCORES, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, OPERTYPE, STATUSFLAG, CUSTOMERTYPE, TITLE, QUESTION, ANSWER, CHECKDESCR, CONTENT, 'MEMBER', CUSTOMERNAME) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tooper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toopertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scores,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{publicflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{datediff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{question,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{checkdescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{member,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{customername,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_tasklog set SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STYPE = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STYPENAME = #{stypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TOOPER = #{tooper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOOPERTIME = #{toopertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUSNAME = #{statusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SLEVEL = #{slevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKRESULT = #{checkresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORES = #{scores,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHECKOPER = #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PUBLICFLAG = #{publicflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DATEDIFF = #{datediff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUSFLAG = #{statusflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMERTYPE = #{customertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, QUESTION = #{question,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CHECKDESCR = #{checkdescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, 'MEMBER' = #{member,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CUSTOMERNAME = #{customername,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, STYPE, STYPENAME, OPER, OPERTIME, TOOPER, TOOPERTIME, 'STATUS', STATUSNAME, SLEVEL, CHECKRESULT, SCORES, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, OPERTYPE, STATUSFLAG, CUSTOMERTYPE, TITLE, QUESTION, ANSWER, CHECKDESCR, CONTENT, 'MEMBER', CUSTOMERNAME from db_tasklog where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, SID, STYPE, STYPENAME, OPER, OPERTIME, TOOPER, TOOPERTIME, 'STATUS', STATUSNAME, SLEVEL, CHECKRESULT, SCORES, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, OPERTYPE, STATUSFLAG, CUSTOMERTYPE, TITLE, QUESTION, ANSWER, CHECKDESCR, CONTENT, 'MEMBER', CUSTOMERNAME from db_tasklog
